text: Cracovia is Polish brand of vodka produced by distillery Polmos Kraków since 1995. There are three varieties of this vodka: * Cracovia Classic, 40% abv * Cracovia Supreme, 42% abv * Cracovia Very Old, 40% abv – dry mixed vodka aged in oak barrels ==External links== * Distillery "Polmos" in Cracow - Awards ==References== Category:Polish vodkas Category:Companies based in Kraków
title: Cracovia (vodka)
